answers.answer: the odor seems to be coming from your privates? i would see the ob/gyn dr. the gyn can do vaginal sample tell if it is a female infection. good luck. hope it gets better

question: i m 23 yrs old male, for the last 6 months i m suffering from a very strange condition. many people around me smells a very different odour , it is very much like ammonia , it comes typically from my undergarment.my urine & stool report shows pus cells around 2-3hpf,but both dermatologist & urologist deny any infection.what should i do ?
title: foul odour from lower half of my body
